au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.transfer

Class DataTransferWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.transfer.DataTransferWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DataTransferWatcher
extends java.lang.Thread
    Processes new session files to transfer them to the Scheduling Server.
